name: Remade
headline: Using AI to hyper-personalize videos for marketplaces
description: Remade uses AI to scale hyper-personalized video generation for marketplaces. Our first customer, Scentbird, a midmarket fragrance marketplace uses Remade to create engaging TikTok ad hooks. We are a team of 4 Cambridge AI hackers with publications in CVPR, the largest Computer Vision conference, and the Lancet Journal, the most respected medical journal globally. Our ARR grew 83% last week from 18k to 33k with an additional 17k pilot revenue with Rappi and eFood, which will take us to a 650k contracted ARR by EoQ. We are building out a research-arm to develop proprietary tech, fusing recommendation algorithms with video models to deliver hyper-personalised videos that increase conversion.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:social-media; industry:marketing; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Alex Matthews, Founder
founders.description:
Alex is the CEO of Remade, a company enabling businesses to automate their entire visual content marketing using AI. Remade's web application transforms basic, low quality photos of any product into professional hooks.

Alex holds a BA in Computer Science from the University of Cambridge. He has contributed to earning £700k+ in revenue/ funding in past ventures.

founders.name: Christos Antonopoulos, Founder
founders.description: Christos Antonopoulos is the co-founder of Remade. Remade transforms basic, low quality photos of any product into professional  advertisement videos . He holds a BA and MEng in Information & Computer Engineering from the University of Cambridge and has research contributions in Machine Learning for Medical Diagnosis and Natural Language Interfaces.

founders.name: Blendi Bylygbashi, Founder
founders.description: Blendi is the co-founder of Remade, a company focused on creating professional videos using AI. He holds a BA and an MEng in Information and Computer Engineering from the University of Cambridge. At Transport for London, he developed deep learning models for CCTV event detection. His research on intra-cranial hypertension was published in the Lancet Neurology Journal. He also managed the BlenDigi YouTube channel, growing it to almost 1 million subscribers and generating $200,000 in ad revenue.

founders.name: Rehan Sheikh, Founder
founders.description: Rehan is the CTO and co-founder of Remade, a company focused on professional photography using diffusion models. He holds a BA and MEng in Information & Computer Engineering from the University of Cambridge!

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Remade**

**Founded**: 2024  
**Location**: San Francisco  
**Team Size**: 4 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch**: S24  

### Mission
Remade aims to revolutionize video marketing by using **AI to hyper-personalize video content** for marketplaces. The idea is simple but powerful—generate engaging, tailored videos that resonate with specific audiences, thereby improving conversion rates.

### Progress and Milestones
- **First Customer**: Scentbird, a notable fragrance marketplace, leverages Remade to craft catchy TikTok ads that grab attention.
- **Rapid Growth**: The company recently saw an **83% increase in Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR)**, skyrocketing from $18k to $33k in just a week. There's also an additional $17k from pilot programs with Rappi and eFood, setting them on a promising trajectory towards a projected **$650k contracted ARR by the end of the quarter**.

### Technology and Expertise
Remade is not just about ambitions; it’s backed by a solid foundation. The founding team consists of **Cambridge AI experts** with notable publications in prestigious venues like CVPR and The Lancet. They plan to establish a **research arm** focused on developing proprietary technology that marries recommendation algorithms with video modeling for even more effective personalization.

### Vision for the Future
As Remade builds its capabilities, it’s set on creating hyper-personalized video experiences that not only engage users but also convert views into real sales. They are carving out a niche in a space that combines artificial intelligence with social media marketing, making them a contender in the B2B SaaS market.

### Tagline
**Innovating Video Personalization**: Where AI meets marketing creativity.

For more details about their offering, visit their website: [Remade.ai](https://www.remade.ai/)

### Overview
In a nutshell, Remade is a startup that stands at the intersection of AI and video marketing, destined to make a mark in the crowded marketplace landscape. With a strong technical team and impressive early traction, they are one to watch in the coming years.
